title: Morgantown Campus Isolation Cases by Day
description: Isolation means avoiding contact with others for at least 10 days after a person's testing date, as directed by the local health department. Students living in a residence hall isolate in Gaskins House. Persons who are isolating should not be on campus for class or work at any point during their isolation period and must remain in isolation until medically cleared. Persons are likely in isolation due to a positive COVID-19 test result.Important: This table is updated every Wednesday by 2 p.m.
